def main():
    t = int(input())
    for case in range(t):
        n = int(input())
        key = input()
        answers = input()
        score = sum([1 for i in range(n) if answers[i] == key[i]])
        points = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
        if score == n:
            print(points[-1])
            continue
        max_score = points[0]
        for i in range(1, score + 1):
            max_score = max(max_score, points[i])
        print(max_score)
main()

test = int(input())
for i in range(test):
    questions = int(input())
    answers = input()
    input_str = input()
    List = list(map(int, input().split()))
    winings = 0
    winings_price = [List[0]]
    for i in range(questions):
        if answers[i] == input_str[i]:
            winings = winings + 1
    if winings == questions:
        print(int(List[winings]))
    else:
        List = List[:winings + 1]
        List.sort(reverse=True)
        print(List[0])

t = int(input())
while t:
    c = 0
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] == b[i]:
            c += 1
    print(l[-1]) if c == n else print(max(l[:c + 1]))
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    correct_ans = input()
    chef_ans = input()
    w = list(map(int, input().split()))
    count = 0
    maxval = 0
    for (i, j) in zip(correct_ans, chef_ans):
        if i == j:
            count += 1
    print(w[-1]) if count == n else print(max(w[:count + 1]))
